update cmdb_idc set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loc_x = #{locX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loc_y = #{locY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_zone = #{timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from cmdb_idc where del_flag!=1
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
and organization_code in
#{organizationCode}
